stance_1: I eat meat once or twice a day
stance_2: I eat meat when it is available
justification: Eating meat when it is available directly supports the habit of eating meat once or twice a day, as frequency is determined by availability.

stance_1: I eat meat once or twice a day
justification: Enjoying eating meat implicitly supports the frequent consumption of meat.

justification: The interviewee's frequency of meat eating is mirrored by their social group, suggesting mutual support or reinforcement.
